attributes.additional_details:
Many say Eurovision is fixed by certain countries voting for each other however it seems that the big fix is that the voting public only count for 50% of the votes and the other 50% by a 5 member jury.

This needs to be changed as to prove a point Britain picked Poland as the Eurovision winner while the 50% jury voted Poland in last place so the votes which are by paid calls made no change to the result therefore becoming a fix and waste of viewer money under false pretences.

If we had a vote only system UK would have been 14th rather than 17th which is not great but better.

It makes no sense for people to call to vote costing you money for each call when in fact that vote means nothing. How is it possible to get this changed to public vote only?
